details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم لا سهل إلا ما جعلته سهلا، وأنت تجعل الحزن إذا شئت سهلا
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلاً
details.transliteration: Allaahumma laa sahla illaa maa ja'altahu sahlan wa Anta taj'alul-hazna 'i<u>th</u>aa shi'ta sahlan.
details.translations: O Allah, there is no ease other than what You make easy. If You please You ease sorrow.
details.reference: Ibn Hibban in his Sahih (no. 2427), and Ibn As- Sunni (no. 351). Al-Hafidh (Ibn Hajar) said that this Hadith is authentic. It was also declared authentic by 'Abdul-Qadir Al-Arna'ut in his checking of An-Nawawi's Kitabul-Athkarp. p106

pageTitle: When one's affairs have become difficult
